1370: Kolekinus was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Marie at age 20 in 1370.
Had a son with Marie, Hardenbernus, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Marie, Winrechus, at age 21.
Lost son Winrechus when Winrechus was 1 years old.
1372: Had a daughter with Marie, Breghlent, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Marie, Vandelghis, at age 23.
1374: Lost son Vandelghis when Vandelghis was 2 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Marie, Aleydis, at age 25.
1376: Had a daughter with Marie, Woltwigis, at age 26.
Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1379: Lost his wife Marie while she was giving birth to Everyng in 1379.
1393: Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 17 years old.
